<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
  const galleries = new Map();

  // init each slider container on the page
  document.querySelectorAll('.slider-container').forEach((root, idx) => {
    // make sure it has an id
    if (!root.id) root.id = `gallery-${idx + 1}`;

    const slides = Array.from(root.querySelectorAll('.slider-image'));
    let index = 0;

    function show(i) {
      slides.forEach((el, k) => el.classList.toggle('active', k === i));
      index = i;
    }
    function next() { show((index + 1) % slides.length); }
    function prev() { show((index - 1 + slides.length) % slides.length); }

    // first render
    show(0);

    // wire only the buttons inside THIS gallery
    root.querySelectorAll('.slider-controls .next').forEach(btn => {
      btn.addEventListener('click', next);
    });
    root.querySelectorAll('.slider-controls .prev').forEach(btn => {
      btn.addEventListener('click', prev);
    });

    // keep a reference if you ever want to control it programmatically
    galleries.set(root.id, { next, prev, show });
  });

  // optionally expose for debugging in console:
  window.__galleries = galleries;
});
</script>
